comments.body:
Can you manually package the `license_file` and add the following link as a comment so that if/when it gets merged, there is a visual reminder to update the feedstock later:
https://github.com/plotly/dash-html-components/pull/46

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@  dev_url: https://github.com/plotly/dash-html-components
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  # TODO : Update this once plotly packages it correctly:
  # https://github.com/plotly/dash-html-components/pull/46
